participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and empathetic, with a passion for storytelling and a good sense of humor.
participant_1.background: I am not rich, but I am fortunate enough to have parents who support my passion for filmmaking. I have 3 dogs. I enjoyed a nice walk outside to appreciate the weather. I am grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility. I'm better at making sounds with my armpits than I am at cooking.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, often seeking deeper meaning in life while balancing a busy schedule.
participant_2.background: My cupcake business keeps me busy, but I also enjoy hiking and biking in my new home state of Florida. I remember pretending to be a dragon trainer with my siblings at the park and getting lost in our imagination. I am a children's librarian. I'm working on my car in the garage, and dreaming of Australia. But, I feel lost and far away from who I truly am.

content.text: I'm so grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility. I'm not rich, but I'm able to do the things I love and have a roof over my head.
I feel lost and far away from who I truly am.
Why do you feel that way?

I'm not sure. I just feel like I'm not living my best life. I'm in a good job, but I don't feel passionate about it. I have a nice home, but I don't feel like it's my home. I have a great family, but I don't feel like I'm close to them. I just feel like I'm floating through life without any direction.
I'm sorry you feel that way. It sounds like you're going through a lot. Is there anything I can do to help?
I don't know. I'm not sure what I need. I just feel like I need to find my way.
Well, I'm here for you if you need anything. I can listen, or I can help you brainstorm some ideas.
No problem. I'm always here for you.
Thanks. I feel a little better.
Thanks. You're a good friend too.
